meanings.definition: The part of a locomotive where the engineer and fireman stand to operate the controls.
meanings.sent1: The engineer carefully stood on the footplate to drive the train.
meanings.sent2: The fireman adjusted the controls on the footplate of the locomotive.
meanings.sent3: The footplate on the train was so crowded that the engineer had to dance around to reach the controls.
meanings.sent4: As the train sped along, the footplate seemed like a tiny island in a sea of tracks.
meanings.sent5: The footplate of the locomotive was like a stage where the engineer performed the symphony of train travel.
